title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 18, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 18, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Static Analysis
items.content_text:
### Programming Languages / [Other](#other-1)

*   [ruff](https://astral.sh/ruff) — Fast Python linter, written in Rust. 10-100x faster than existing linters. Compatible with Python 3.10. Supports file watcher.

### Multiple languages / [Other](#other-1)

*   [Goodcheck](https://sider.github.io/goodcheck) — Regexp based customizable linter.
items.content_html:
Programming Languages / Other

  • ruff — Fast Python linter, written in Rust. 10-100x faster than existing linters. Compatible with Python 3.10. Supports file watcher.

Multiple languages / Other

  • Goodcheck — Regexp based customizable linter.

items.title: Awesome React
items.content_text:
### React Tutorials

*   [React Interview Questions & Answers (⭐42k)](https://github.com/sudheerj/reactjs-interview-questions)
*   [Design patterns and Component patterns for building powerful Web Apps](https://www.patterns.dev/)

### React Graphics and Animations

*   [react-spring (⭐29k)](https://github.com/pmndrs/react-spring) - A spring physics based React animation library
*   [framer-motion (⭐29k)](https://github.com/framer/motion) - Open source, production-ready animation and gesture library for React
items.content_html:
React Tutorials

  • React Interview Questions & Answers (⭐42k)
  • Design patterns and Component patterns for building powerful Web Apps

React Graphics and Animations

  • react-spring (⭐29k) - A spring physics based React animation library
  • framer-motion (⭐29k) - Open source, production-ready animation and gesture library for React

items.title: Awesome V
items.content_text:
### Command-line

*   [vzcc (⭐28)](https://github.com/malisipi/vzcc) - A CLI cross-compiling tool based on Zig CC for V.
items.content_html:
Command-line

items.title: Awesome Ddd
items.content_text:
### Sample Projects / JavaScript / TypeScript

*   [Over-engineered ToDo app (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/bitloops/ddd-hexagonal-cqrs-es-eda) - Complete working example of using Domain Driven Design (DDD), Hexagonal Architecture, CQRS, Event Sourcing (ES), Event Driven Architecture (EDA), Behaviour Driven Development (BDD) using TypeScript and NestJS generated using the [Bitloops Language (BL) (⭐353)](https://github.com/bitloops/bitloops-language).

### Libraries and Frameworks / JavaScript / TypeScript

*   [Bitloops Language (BL) (⭐353)](https://github.com/bitloops/bitloops-language) - Open-source, 4th-generation, transpiled programming language that helps you write clean code, well-designed systems, and build high-quality software that is testable, auditable and maintainable using DDD and Hexagonal Architecture.
*   [Node API Boilerplate (⭐3.3k)](https://github.com/talyssonoc/node-api-boilerplate) - NodeJS web API boilerplate for DDD and Clean Architecture applications.
items.content_html:
Sample Projects / JavaScript / TypeScript

  • Over-engineered ToDo app (⭐1.3k) - Complete working example of using Domain Driven Design (DDD), Hexagonal Architecture, CQRS, Event Sourcing (ES), Event Driven Architecture (EDA), Behaviour Driven Development (BDD) using TypeScript and NestJS generated using the Bitloops Language (BL) (⭐353).

Libraries and Frameworks / JavaScript / TypeScript

  • Bitloops Language (BL) (⭐353) - Open-source, 4th-generation, transpiled programming language that helps you write clean code, well-designed systems, and build high-quality software that is testable, auditable and maintainable using DDD and Hexagonal Architecture.
  • Node API Boilerplate (⭐3.3k) - NodeJS web API boilerplate for DDD and Clean Architecture applications.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Color / Diagnostics

*   [Mr-LLLLL/interestingwords.nvim (⭐47)](https://github.com/Mr-LLLLL/interestingwords.nvim) - Highlight multiple word same time and navigate word under cursor with scrolling smoothly, display search count in virualtext.

### Colorscheme Creation / Diagnostics

*   [echasnovski/mini.nvim#mini.colors (⭐7.5k)](https://github.com/echasnovski/mini.nvim/blob/main/readmes/mini-colors.md) - Module of `mini.nvim` to tweak and save any color scheme. Also can animate transition and convert between some color spaces.

### Utility / Diagnostics

*   [hbac.nvim (⭐215)](https://github.com/axkirillov/hbac.nvim) - Automatically close buffers you are not working on.
items.content_html:
Color / Diagnostics

  • Mr-LLLLL/interestingwords.nvim (⭐47) - Highlight multiple word same time and navigate word under cursor with scrolling smoothly, display search count in virualtext.

Colorscheme Creation / Diagnostics

  • echasnovski/mini.nvim#mini.colors (⭐7.5k) - Module of mini.nvim to tweak and save any color scheme. Also can animate transition and convert between some color spaces.

Utility / Diagnostics

  • hbac.nvim (⭐215) - Automatically close buffers you are not working on.

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Developer Tools / Version Control

*   [GitFinder](https://gitfinder.com/) - Fast and lightweight Git client for Mac with Finder integration.

### Utilities / General Tools

*   [lo-rain](https://lo.cafe/lo-rain) - Create a customizable rain over your desktop and apps, with splash over the dock.

### Utilities / Window Management

*   [Sidebar](http://sidebarapp.net/) - The modern Dock replacement for your Mac.
items.content_html:
Developer Tools / Version Control

  • GitFinder - Fast and lightweight Git client for Mac with Finder integration.

Utilities / General Tools

  • lo-rain - Create a customizable rain over your desktop and apps, with splash over the dock.

Utilities / Window Management

  • Sidebar - The modern Dock replacement for your Mac.

items.title: Awesome Spark
items.content_text: ### Packages / Middleware * [Apache Kyuubi (⭐2.2k)](https://github.com/apache/kyuubi) - A distributed multi-tenant JDBC server for large-scale data processing and analytics, built on top of Apache Spark. ### Resources / Docker Images * [apache/spark](https://hub.docker.com/r/apache/spark) - Apache Spark Official Docker images.
items.content_html:
Packages / Middleware

  • Apache Kyuubi (⭐2.2k) - A distributed multi-tenant JDBC server for large-scale data processing and analytics, built on top of Apache Spark.

Resources / Docker Images

  • apache/spark - Apache Spark Official Docker images.
